about_the_game:
This pack of 3D models contains a set of firearms that are usually used for hunting. ...And a Desert Eagle thrown in, just for fun.
Models included:
1. Benelli M4 Super 90
2. Browning A5
3. Mossberg 500 SPX
4. Remington 870
5. Remington 700
6. Winchester Model 21
7. Steyr Scout
8. Mauser 98k
9. Mosin Nagant
10. Desert Eagle

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Linux, version 10.10 or later
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu Linux, version 10.10 or later
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

Models included: Benelli M4 Super 90, Browning A5, Mossberg 500 SPX, Remington 870, Remington 700, Winchester Model 21, Steyr Scout, Mauser 98k, Mosin Nagant, Desert Eagle
